CVXPY
Maximize
  -2.5
Subject To
 8: x == 0.0
Bounds
 x free
End
----------------------------------------
AFTER COMPILATION
Minimize
 Obj: 0 x_0
Subject to
 c1: +1 x_0 = +0
Bounds
 x_0 free
End
----------------------------------------
SCIP
Maximize
 Obj: -2.5
Subject to
 8: +1 x = +0
Bounds
 x free
End
